metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7946 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Information Exposure vulnerability in Unity8 as used on the Ubuntu phoneand possibly also in Unity8 shipped elsewhere. This allows an attacker toenable the MTP service by opening the emergency dialer. Fixed in8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1 and 8.11+15.04.20160122-0ubuntu1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7946` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

indicators-client - 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1
unity-scope-tool - 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1
unity8 - 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1
unity8-autopilot - 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1
unity8-common - 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1
unity8-fake-env - 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1
unity8-private - 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: unity8 package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1').
